SELECT @@IDENTITY AS 'Identity'
insert into data_collection_tel
tel, name, status, start_time, end_time, collection_id,
values
#{tel}, #{name}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{collectionId},
mapper.select: select id,tel,collection_id from data_collection_tel where collection_id = #{collectionId}

select dc.collect_time as collectTime from data_collection dc LEFT JOIN data_case da on dc.case_id = da.id where dc.delete_flag = 0
and dc.collect_time >= convert(datetime,#{dateStart}, 20)
and dc.collect_time <= convert(datetime,#{dateEnd}, 20)
and dc.collect_time>= convert(datetime,#{monthStart}, 20)
and dc.collect_time<= convert(datetime,#{monthEnd}, 20)
and dc.collect_time>= convert(datetime,#{dateSearchStart}, 20)
and dc.collect_time<= convert(datetime,#{dateSearchEnd}, 20)
AND da.odv =#{odv}

select dc.collect_time as collectTime from data_collection dc LEFT JOIN data_case da on dc.case_id = da.id where dc.delete_flag = 0 and dc.result in (select id from sys_data_dictionary where dictionary_id = 14 and sys_flag=1 )
and dc.collect_time >= convert(datetime,#{dateStart}, 20)
and dc.collect_time <= convert(datetime,#{dateEnd}, 20)
and dc.collect_time>= convert(datetime,#{monthStart}, 20)
and dc.collect_time<= convert(datetime,#{monthEnd}, 20)
and dc.collect_time>= convert(datetime,#{dateSearchStart}, 20)
and dc.collect_time<= convert(datetime,#{dateSearchEnd}, 20)
AND da.odv = #{odv}

select dc.collect_time as collectTime from data_collection dc LEFT JOIN data_case da on dc.case_id = da.id where dc.delete_flag = 0
and dc.collect_time >= convert(datetime,#{dateStart}, 20)
and dc.collect_time <= convert(datetime,#{dateEnd}, 20)
and dc.collect_time>= convert(datetime,#{monthStart}, 20)
and dc.collect_time<= convert(datetime,#{monthEnd}, 20)

SELECT dct.result as collectionResult,COUNT(result) as countResult from data_collection dct LEFT JOIN data_case da on dct.case_id = da.id where dct.delete_flag = 0
AND da.odv = #{odv}
and dct.collect_time >= convert(datetime,#{dateStart}, 20)
and dct.collect_time <= convert(datetime,#{dateEnd}, 20)
GROUP BY result
